sys_remote_update_set.description: Group Dependency check application files. This installs a global application which can be used to check where group is used before deactivating it.
sys_remote_update_set.name: Group Dependency Check_v1

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a82a789a2f332010d826d5f62799b6b0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_group_dependency</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Get Group Dependency</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var groupSysId = current.u_group;
	var groupName = current.getDisplayValue('u_group');
	
	var gDUtil = new GroupDependencyUtilGlobal();
	var groupDependency = gDUtil.getGroupDependency(groupName, groupSysId);
	
	current.u_group_dependency = groupDependency;

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-04-30 17:17:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a82a789a2f332010d826d5f62799b6b0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get Group Dependency</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a82a789a2f332010d826d5f62799b6b0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-05-01 15:09:15</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a82a789a2f332010d826d5f62799b6b0"/></record_update>
